fullplot: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.
plot: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.
title: About Last Night

tomatoes.consensus: About Last Night wanders even further from the David Mamet play that inspired the original, but it benefits from an engaging cast and a screenplay that smartly balances romance and comedy.

writers: Tim Kazurinsky (based on the screenplay by)
Denise DeClue (based on the screenplay by)
David Mamet (based upon "Sexual Perversity in Chicago" by)
